tab1.text1:
All rules are contingent on the judgment of PGV Admins and Staff.

If you break the “spirit” of the rule without breaking the letter of the law, you can still be subject to consequences.

This is a game for everyone to have fun, let’s keep it mature

No glitching, meshing, bug exploits, etc. No hacks or real-money trading.

One character per person per map/cluster. You may not create a secondary character for the purpose of exploiting the in-game accountability systems.

Do not block artifacts, obelisks, crate spawns or high-value resource spawns (metal, obsidian, etc).

When looting beaver dams, clear everything, including the wood, out of the dam so it will respawn.

No long-term harassment or imprisonment. Players must be released after no more than 1 hour. All prisoners must released before you log off.

Tribe names can only be changed once every 2 weeks.

Repeatedly raiding the same tribe in a short period of time (1-3 days) will be considered griefing, action may be taken by the admins if this occurs.

No insiding - If you wish to leave a tribe, you need to tell your tribe mates/the tribe owner. Do not disable defenses, unclaim tames, or destroy builds before leaving

tab3.text1:
Welcome to Petunia Gaming Village, where gaming is more than just a hobby – it's a community-driven adventure. Founded by a group of passionate gamers, Petunia Gaming Village is a haven for enthusiasts who share a love for VR, PC, and console gaming.

At Petunia Gaming Village, our primary focus is on creating a space for gamers of all backgrounds. Whether you're a seasoned player or a newcomer to the gaming world, our community is built on the principles of respect and maturity.

In addition to playing on this server the PGV community takes a unique approach by gathering members from various tribes on our server to form a temporary tribe on a random server and see just how far our collective skills can take us.

Come be a part of our ever-growing gaming family at Petunia Gaming Village, where the joy of gaming meets the warmth of community. Embrace the adventure, make memories, and let the games unite us all.
